meanings.definition: A person who makes a promise or commitment.
meanings.sent1: The vower promised to always be there for his friend.
meanings.sent2: The young vower pledged to help his community.
meanings.sent3: The vower jokingly promised to eat a mountain of ice cream.
meanings.sent4: She was a vower of dreams, always believing in the impossible.
meanings.sent5: The vower's commitment shone brightly in the dark times.

meanings.definition: To make a solemn promise or pledge.
meanings.sent1: She will vower to protect the environment.
meanings.sent2: He vowered to always speak the truth.
meanings.sent3: The children vower to never eat vegetables again.
meanings.sent4: The stars vower to guide us through the night.
meanings.sent5: The knight vowered to defend the kingdom with his life.
